author: Oliver Knight
title: 5G Chipmaker Sequans Joins the Bitcoin Treasury Strategy Rush
description: Shares of the Paris-based company are higher by 14% in premarket New York action.
content:
Telecommunication company Sequans (NYSE:SQNS) has announced that it will raise $384 million to launch a bitcoin treasury, according to a press release.
The company has agreed to issue and sell $195 … [+805 chars]
